title: Lakshmi Kasula Mala Pendant - Ruby Radiance
features: This exquisite pendant is inspired by the Chandramukhi/Addigai design, featuring intricate filigree work embellished with shimmering CZ stones. A vibrant pear-shaped ruby serves as the focal point, radiating warmth and elegance. Delicate gold balls, reminiscent of kasula mala, dangle gracefully, adding movement and charm. The piece showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship with a modern, lightweight design.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of classic South Indian elegance is desired. Suitable for formal gatherings and celebrations.
description: This pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The radiant ruby and sparkling CZ stones create a captivating interplay of light, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value and brilliance. This is a statement piece that speaks of heritage and sophistication, a true heirloom to cherish for generations. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting luster, maintaining its beauty over time.
